my_business: My business is DesszGuard Private Limited – a trusted provider of smart security solutions. We specialize in CCTV installation, burglar alarm systems, biometric access control, video door phones, and annual maintenance services. Our goal is to protect homes, offices, and businesses with reliable, cutting-edge security systems.
top_product: Smart Burglar Alarm System – Wireless, mobile app controlled, instant alert system
ideal_referral: “My ideal referral is a decision-maker in schools, hospitals, or apartment complexes seeking long-term AMC (Annual Maintenance Contract) for their security systems.”
top_problem_solved: “Many customers face unreliable after-sales support with local CCTV providers. We solve this by offering prompt service, AMC (Annual Maintenance Contracts), and lifetime customer care for all our security systems.”
my_favourite_bni_story: “My favourite BNI story is when a fellow member referred me to a jewellery shop owner who was worried about rising theft incidents. We quickly did a site survey, proposed a smart CCTV and burglar alarm solution, and completed the installation within 48 hours. Not only did the client appreciate our speed and service, but he referred us to three more businesses in his network. That one BNI referral led to four major installations and a strong relationship that continues today.”
